oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Alex Stewart smooths a stave
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Alex Stewart smooths a stave on a shaving horse with a draw knife at his shop in Sneedville, TN, 1977.
Stewart is a third-generation cooper. Both his father and grandfather began woodworking in their native England. Stewart is a 1983 National Heritage Fellowship recipient.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stewart, Alex
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Overcast, Roy
